snippet: The civil trial over Michael Jackson’s death might hinge on whether reasonable care was exercised in the hiring of his doctor.
abstract: Civil trial over death of singer Michael Jackson hinges on questions of whether Anschutz Entertainment Group Live hired physician Conrad Murray who administered anesthetic that killed Jackson in June 2009, and if it was negligent in doing so; group was promoting Jackson's comeback concert This Is It.
lead_paragraph: The civil trial over Michael Jackson’s death might hinge on whether reasonable care was exercised in the hiring of his doctor.

headline.seo: At Michael Jackson Trial, Question of A.E.G.’s Negligence
headline.main: Negligence Is Debated in Jackson Death Case
headline.print_headline: Negligence Is Debated In Jackson Death Case
